external_games.name: Mystic Destinies: Serendipity of Aeons - Hikaru: Book 1

name: Mystic Destinies: Serendipity of Aeons - Hikaru: Book 1
summary: In the finale of Mystic Destinies: Serendipity of Aeons, become Tsubasa one last time and begin an epic journey spanning time and space while uncovering some of largest secrets of the Mystic Destinies universe. In the process, you may just find yourself falling in love with a man who is anything but what you expected.
